mapper.insert: insert into board (title, picture, content, nickname, food_category_id) values(#{title}, #{picture}, #{content}, #{nickname}, #{food_category_id})
mapper.select: select b.title,b.picture,b.recommand_count,group_concat(sc.store_category_name) as store_name from board b left join board_store bs on b.board_id=bs.board_id left join store_category sc on bs.store_category_id=sc.store_category_id group by b.board_id order by b.board_id desc limit ${row};

select b.title,b.picture,b.recommand_count,group_concat(sc.store_category_name) as store_name from board b left join board_store bs on b.board_id=bs.board_id left join store_category sc on bs.store_category_id=sc.store_category_id group by b.board_id order by b.recommand_count desc limit 10;

select b.title,b.picture,b.recommand_count,group_concat(sc.store_category_name) as store_name from board b left join board_store bs on b.board_id=bs.board_id left join store_category sc on bs.store_category_id=sc.store_category_id join wish w USING(board_id) WHERE w.nickname=${user.nickname} group by b.board_id order by w.wish_id desc limit ${row};
